ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious faction imbalance (was Avoiding faction hit s in PoG when  pulling)
ygData.msgSnippet: we started off allying with dwarves/dragons.  now we are giant lovers.  we killed their king first of course hehe.  you are right about the imbalance. allying
ygData.messageBody:
we started off allying with dwarves/dragons. now we are giant lovers. we
killed their king first of course hehe. you are right about the imbalance.
allying with dragons/dwarves has absolutely no reward loot-wise. killing
dain/yel is far better.

Shada

> On a related note since we were talking about risk/reward in Velious:
>
> I think the entire Velious faction/loot setup is all out of
> balance. Seems
> to me that allying with the giants is far and away the best
> choice.
